feed.title: No TV and No Beer
feed.subtitle: Experiences in the digital world and sometimes the real world, too

entry.title: First Post
entry.content:
I tried starting this site a couple years ago, and then I realized I didn’t have the patience to collect my thoughts.

Let’s try again to distill those passing thoughts.
entry.summary: I tried starting this site a couple years ago, and then I realized I didn’t have the patience to collect my thoughts.
